doc:
Dai Bradley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dai_Bradley 0 David "Dai" Bradley (born 27 September 1953) is an English actor who became well known for his first time role of Billy Casper in the critically acclaimed 1969 film Kes, directed by Ken Loach. David_"_Dai_"_Bradley ( born 27_September_1953 ) is an_English_actor who became well_known for his_first_time_role of Billy_Casper in the_critically_acclaimed_1969_film_Kes , directed by Ken_Loach .
